code: import React from"react";const bookmarkCourse=(data,index)=>{console.log("bookmarkCourse ran/clicked - :",data,index);};const likeThisCourse=(data,index)=>{console.log("likeThisCourse ran/clicked - :",data,index);};const dislikeThisCourse=(data,index)=>{console.log("dislikeThisCourse ran/clicked - :",data,index);};const openBookmarkPopover=(data,index,setBookmarkPopoverState)=>{setBookmarkPopoverState(prevState=>{return{...prevState,["popover".concat(index)]:true};});};const closeBookmarkPopover=(data,index,setBookmarkPopoverState)=>{setBookmarkPopoverState(prevState=>{return{...prevState,["popover".concat(index)]:false};});};const openLikePopover=(data,index,setLikePopoverState)=>{setLikePopoverState(prevState=>{return{...prevState,["popover".concat(index)]:true};});};const closeLikePopover=(data,index,setLikePopoverState)=>{setLikePopoverState(prevState=>{return{...prevState,["popover".concat(index)]:false};});};const openDislikePopover=(data,index,setDislikePopoverState)=>{setDislikePopoverState(prevState=>{return{...prevState,["popover".concat(index)]:true};});};const closeDislikePopover=(data,index,setDislikePopoverState)=>{setDislikePopoverState(prevState=>{return{...prevState,["popover".concat(index)]:false};});};export default{closeDislikePopover,openDislikePopover,closeLikePopover,openLikePopover,closeBookmarkPopover,openBookmarkPopover,bookmarkCourse,dislikeThisCourse,likeThisCourse};
